examples.patterns.decorator

Class ShortSword

  • java.lang.Object
    • examples.patterns.decorator.Entity
      • examples.patterns.decorator.Equipment
        • examples.patterns.decorator.ShortSword

  • public class ShortSword
extends Equipment
    Simple decorator class that assigns it's strength value in it's constructor, and uses it in the getAttack method. It takes an entity as a parameter in it's constructor. This is what allows the decorator pattern to work.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class examples.patterns.decorator.Equipment

        entity

      • Fields inherited from class examples.patterns.decorator.Entity

        attack, defence

      Constructors

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double getAttack()
      Returns the current attack of the entity, which is the attack value after all layers have done their calculations
      double getDefence()
      Returns the current defence of the entity, which is the defence value after all layers have done their calculations

      • Methods inherited from class examples.patterns.decorator.Entity

        setAttack, setDefence
